segments.text: I'm observing a peculiar kitchen scene right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink on the right side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is absolutely gushing out of the faucet, completely filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet, creating a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone not notice this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands directly in front of it, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on that plate, oblivious to the miniature flood around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually submerged in the growing puddle, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, which I find quite unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be incredibly focused or deeply in thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable that she's unaware of the cascading water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope she realizes what's happening soon before the entire kitchen is soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water will certainly cause a lot of damage to those cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR
